summary: This bill, H.R. 2880, aims to provide employment protections and reinstatement for probationary Federal career employees. It extends due process protections, as outlined in Title 5 and Title 38 of the United States Code, to those promoted within the competitive, excepted, or Senior Executive Service. Specifically, it provides those employees removed after a promotion during a certain time frame the option of reinstatement with backpay. The bill excludes those in political positions from these protections.
